title: Efficiency Penalty Weighting Profile
description: Defines the baseline penalty weights applied to the Autonomous Efficiency Score (AES) when specific failure classifications occur during an evolution cycle.

MISINTERPRETATION.description: Fundamental misunderstanding of the task objective. Often requires full cycle restart.

RESOURCE_EXHAUSTION.description: Cycle aborted due to reaching defined resource limits (e.g., recursion depth, max budget, timeout).

CODE_REVERSION_LIMIT.description: Excessive instability requiring multiple reverts; cycle failed to stabilize.

LLM_HALLUCINATION.description: Failure traced back to injecting structurally flawed or non-existent external information.

EXTERNAL_API_ERROR.description: Non-deterministic external service failure (e.g., connection reset, 500 status).
